channel.title: Kahoot Insights Feed
channel.description: Latest insights and trends from Kahoot answers and demographics

item.title: Top Birth City by Points
item.description: Mumbai leads with the highest total points! Fun fact: This city has produced quiz champions across all rounds!

item.title: Generation Champions
item.description: Millennial generation dominates the leaderboard! Fun fact: Different generations bring unique perspectives to the quiz!

item.title: Speed Demon
item.description: Sb is the fastest correct answerer with 1.45s average! Fun fact: Quick thinking often correlates with higher scores!

item.title: Overall Accuracy
item.description: Participants achieved 54.5% accuracy across all rounds! Fun fact: This shows the perfect balance of challenge and knowledge!

item.title: Performance Trend
item.description: Scores are trending up from Round 1 to Round 5! Fun fact: Teams learn and adapt as they progress through rounds!
